Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that the CDC has significantly lowered the COVID-19 death toll.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the CDC has not adjusted or reduced the number of deaths due to COVID-19.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a faulty comparison of two different lists maintained by the CDC.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim promotes the conspiracy theory that the pandemic was planned or is a hoax, which is an alternative explanation unsupported by evidence.
